ComicInfo.Summary: Thrill to the climactic confrontation between Commander Adam Archer and the treacherous Basil Cronus! Meanwhile, the mysterious, all-American superhero known as Crashman is being held captive... and his rescuer will shock you! All this, plus the surreal origin of the alien visitor known as Maxim!
